verses.text:
And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* \w diligently|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* \add and\add* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, that the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* will \w set|strong="H5414"\w* thee on \w high|strong="H5945"\w* above all \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*:

And all these \w blessings|strong="H1293"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* on thee, and \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* thee, if thou shalt \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w body|strong="H0990"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, the \w increase|strong="H7698"\w* of thy \w kine|strong="H0504"\w*, and the \w flocks|strong="H6251"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.
\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shall be\add* thy \w basket|strong="H2935"\w* and thy \w store|strong="H4863"\w*.\f + \fr 28.5 \ft store: or, dough, or, kneadingtroughs\f*

\w Blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* when thou comest \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w blessed|strong="H1288"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* when thou goest \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against thee to be \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*: they shall come \w out|strong="H3318"\w* against thee \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, and \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thee \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w command|strong="H6680"\w* the \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* upon thee in thy \w storehouses|strong="H0618"\w*, and in all that thou \w settest|strong="H4916"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto; and he shall \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* thee in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w giveth|strong="H5414"\w* thee.  +  r 28.8  t storehouses: or, barns *

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w establish|strong="H6965"\w* thee an \w holy|strong="H6918"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* unto himself, as he hath \w sworn|strong="H7650"\w* unto thee, if thou shalt \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, and \w walk|strong="H1980"\w* in his \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*.

And all \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* shall \w see|strong="H7200"\w* that thou art \w called|strong="H7121"\w* by the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*; and they shall be \w afraid|strong="H3372"\w* of thee.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall make thee \w plenteous|strong="H3498"\w* in \w goods|strong="H2896"\w*, in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w body|strong="H0990"\w*, and in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and in the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w ground|strong="H0127"\w*, in the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* which the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w sware|strong="H7650"\w* unto thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee.  +  r 28.11  t in goods: or, for good *  +  r 28.11  t body: Heb. belly *

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w open|strong="H6605"\w* unto thee his \w good|strong="H2896"\w* \w treasure|strong="H0214"\w*, the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* to \w give|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* unto thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* in his \w season|strong="H6256"\w*, and to \w bless|strong="H1288"\w* all the \w work|strong="H4639"\w* of thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*: and thou shalt \w lend|strong="H3867"\w* unto \w many|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, and thou shalt not \w borrow|strong="H3867"\w*.

And the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w make|strong="H5414"\w* thee the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and not the \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*; and thou shalt be above \w only|strong="H4605"\w*, and thou shalt not be \w beneath|strong="H4295"\w*; if that thou \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* and to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \add them:\add*

And thou shalt not go \w aside|strong="H5493"\w* from any of the \w words|strong="H1697"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \add to\add* the right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*, or \add to\add* the \w left|strong="H8040"\w*, to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w* to \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* them.

¶ But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not \w hearken|strong="H8085"\w* unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w observe|strong="H8104"\w* to \w do|strong="H6213"\w* all his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* which I \w command|strong="H6680"\w* thee this \w day|strong="H3117"\w*; that all these \w curses|strong="H7045"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, and \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* thee:
\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w*, and \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* in the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.
\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shall be\add* thy \w basket|strong="H2935"\w* and thy \w store|strong="H4863"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shall be\add* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w body|strong="H0990"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, the \w increase|strong="H7698"\w* of thy \w kine|strong="H0504"\w*, and the \w flocks|strong="H6251"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*.

\w Cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* when thou comest \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add shalt\add* thou \add be\add* when thou goest \w out|strong="H3318"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* upon thee \w cursing|strong="H3994"\w*, \w vexation|strong="H4103"\w*, and \w rebuke|strong="H4045"\w*, in all that thou \w settest|strong="H4916"\w* thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* unto for to \w do|strong="H6213"\w*, until thou be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*, and until thou \w perish|strong="H0006"\w* \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w*; \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w wickedness|strong="H7455"\w* of thy \w doings|strong="H4611"\w*, whereby thou hast \w forsaken|strong="H5800"\w* me.\f + \fr 28.20 \ft for…: Heb. which thou wouldest do\f*

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall make the \w pestilence|strong="H1698"\w* \w cleave|strong="H1692"\w* unto thee, until he have \w consumed|strong="H3615"\w* thee from off the \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee with a \w consumption|strong="H7829"\w*, and with a \w fever|strong="H6920"\w*, and with an \w inflammation|strong="H1816"\w*, and with an extreme \w burning|strong="H2746"\w*, and with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, and with \w blasting|strong="H7711"\w*, and with \w mildew|strong="H3420"\w*; and they shall \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee until thou \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*.\f + \fr 28.22 \ft sword: or, drought\f*

And thy \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* that \add is\add* over thy \w head|strong="H7218"\w* shall be \w brass|strong="H5178"\w*, and the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* that is under thee \add shall be\add* \w iron|strong="H1270"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w rain|strong="H4306"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w powder|strong="H0080"\w* and \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*: from \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* shall it come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon thee, until thou be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w cause|strong="H5414"\w* thee to be \w smitten|strong="H5062"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*: thou shalt go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* \w way|strong="H1870"\w* against them, and \w flee|strong="H5127"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* them: and shalt be \w removed|strong="H2189"\w* into all the \w kingdoms|strong="H4467"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 28.25 \ft removed: Heb. for a removing\f*

And thy \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* shall be \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* unto all \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w air|strong="H8064"\w*, and unto the \w beasts|strong="H0929"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and no man shall fray \add them\add* \w away|strong="H2729"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* will \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee with the \w botch|strong="H7822"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and with the \w emerods|strong="H2914"\w*, and with the \w scab|strong="H1618"\w*, and with the \w itch|strong="H2775"\w*, whereof thou \w canst|strong="H3201"\w* not be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee with \w madness|strong="H7697"\w*, and \w blindness|strong="H5788"\w*, and \w astonishment|strong="H8541"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*:

And thou shalt \w grope|strong="H4959"\w* at \w noonday|strong="H6672"\w*, as the \w blind|strong="H5787"\w* \w gropeth|strong="H4959"\w* in \w darkness|strong="H0653"\w*, and thou shalt not \w prosper|strong="H6743"\w* in thy \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: and thou shalt be only \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* and \w spoiled|strong="H1497"\w* \w evermore|strong="H3117"\w*, and no man shall \w save|strong="H3467"\w* \add thee\add*.

Thou shalt \w betroth|strong="H0781"\w* a \w wife|strong="H0802"\w*, and \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w man|strong="H0376"\w* shall \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* with her: thou shalt \w build|strong="H1129"\w* an \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and thou shalt not \w dwell|strong="H3427"\w* therein: thou shalt \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* a \w vineyard|strong="H3754"\w*, and shalt not gather the \w grapes|strong="H2490"\w* thereof.\f + \fr 28.30 \ft gather…: Heb. profane, or, use it as common meat\f*

Thine \w ox|strong="H7794"\w* \add shall be\add* \w slain|strong="H2873"\w* before thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and thou shalt not \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* thereof: thine \w ass|strong="H2543"\w* \add shall be\add* violently taken \w away|strong="H1497"\w* from before thy \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, and shall not be \w restored|strong="H7725"\w* to thee: thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* \add shall be\add* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w*, and thou shalt have none to \w rescue|strong="H3467"\w* \add them\add*.\f + \fr 28.31 \ft shall not…: Heb. shall not return to thee\f*

Thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w* \add shall be\add* \w given|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w another|strong="H0312"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*, and thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* shall \w look|strong="H7200"\w*, and \w fail|strong="H3616"\w* \add with longing\add* for them all the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* long: and \add there shall be\add* no \w might|strong="H0410"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*.

The \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, and all thy \w labours|strong="H3018"\w*, shall a \w nation|strong="H5971"\w* which thou \w knowest|strong="H3045"\w* not eat \w up|strong="H0398"\w*; and thou shalt be only \w oppressed|strong="H6231"\w* and \w crushed|strong="H7533"\w* \w alway|strong="H3117"\w*:
So that thou shalt be \w mad|strong="H7696"\w* for the \w sight|strong="H4758"\w* of thine \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w* which thou shalt \w see|strong="H7200"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* thee in the \w knees|strong="H1290"\w*, and in the \w legs|strong="H7785"\w*, with a \w sore|strong="H7451"\w* \w botch|strong="H7822"\w* that \w cannot|strong="H3201"\w* be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w*, from the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* unto the top of thy \w head|strong="H6936"\w*.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bring|strong="H3212"\w* thee, and thy \w king|strong="H4428"\w* which thou shalt \w set|strong="H6965"\w* over thee, unto a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* which neither thou nor thy \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* have \w known|strong="H3045"\w*; and there shalt thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* \w other|strong="H0312"\w* \w gods|strong="H0430"\w*, \w wood|strong="H6086"\w* and \w stone|strong="H0068"\w*.

And thou shalt become an \w astonishment|strong="H8047"\w*, a \w proverb|strong="H4912"\w*, and a \w byword|strong="H8148"\w*, among all \w nations|strong="H5971"\w* whither the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w lead|strong="H5090"\w* thee.

Thou shalt \w carry|strong="H3318"\w* \w much|strong="H7227"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* into the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and shalt \w gather|strong="H0622"\w* \add but\add* \w little|strong="H4592"\w* \w in|strong="H0622"\w*; for the \w locust|strong="H0697"\w* shall \w consume|strong="H2628"\w* it.

Thou shalt \w plant|strong="H5193"\w* \w vineyards|strong="H3754"\w*, and \w dress|strong="H5647"\w* \add them\add*, but shalt neither \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \add of\add* the \w wine|strong="H3196"\w*, nor \w gather|strong="H0103"\w* \add the grapes;\add* for the \w worms|strong="H8438"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* them.

Thou shalt have olive \w trees|strong="H2132"\w* throughout all thy \w coasts|strong="H1366"\w*, but thou shalt not \w anoint|strong="H5480"\w* \add thyself\add* with the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*; for thine \w olive|strong="H2132"\w* shall \w cast|strong="H5394"\w* \add his fruit\add*.

Thou shalt \w beget|strong="H3205"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, but thou shalt not enjoy them; for they shall \w go|strong="H3212"\w* into \w captivity|strong="H7628"\w*.\f + \fr 28.41 \ft thou shalt not…: Heb. they shall not be thine\f*

All thy \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* and \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w* shall the \w locust|strong="H6767"\w* \w consume|strong="H3423"\w*.\f + \fr 28.42 \ft consume: or, possess\f*

The \w stranger|strong="H1616"\w* that \add is\add* \w within|strong="H7130"\w* thee shall get \w up|strong="H5927"\w* above thee \w very|strong="H4605"\w* \w high|strong="H4605"\w*; and thou shalt come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w very|strong="H4295"\w* \w low|strong="H4295"\w*.
He shall \w lend|strong="H3867"\w* to thee, and thou shalt not \w lend|strong="H3867"\w* to him: he shall be the \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and thou shalt be the \w tail|strong="H2180"\w*.

Moreover all these \w curses|strong="H7045"\w* shall \w come|strong="H0935"\w* upon thee, and shall \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* thee, and \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* thee, till thou be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*; because thou \w hearkenedst|strong="H8085"\w* not unto the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, to \w keep|strong="H8104"\w* his \w commandments|strong="H4687"\w* and his \w statutes|strong="H2708"\w* which he \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w* thee:
And they shall be upon thee for a \w sign|strong="H0226"\w* and for a \w wonder|strong="H4159"\w*, and upon thy \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w for|strong="H5704"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*.

Because thou \w servedst|strong="H5647"\w* not the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* with \w joyfulness|strong="H8057"\w*, and with \w gladness|strong="H2898"\w* of \w heart|strong="H3824"\w*, for the \w abundance|strong="H7230"\w* of all \add things;\add*

Therefore shalt thou \w serve|strong="H5647"\w* thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w send|strong="H7971"\w* against thee, in \w hunger|strong="H7458"\w*, and in \w thirst|strong="H6772"\w*, and in \w nakedness|strong="H5903"\w*, and in \w want|strong="H2640"\w* of all \add things:\add* and he shall \w put|strong="H5414"\w* a \w yoke|strong="H5923"\w* of \w iron|strong="H1270"\w* upon thy \w neck|strong="H6677"\w*, until he have \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w* thee.

The \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w bring|strong="H5375"\w* a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* against thee from \w far|strong="H7350"\w*, from the \w end|strong="H7097"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, \add as swift\add* as the \w eagle|strong="H5404"\w* \w flieth|strong="H1675"\w*; a \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* whose \w tongue|strong="H3956"\w* thou shalt not \w understand|strong="H8085"\w*;\f + \fr 28.49 \ft understand: Heb. hear\f*

A \w nation|strong="H1471"\w* of \w fierce|strong="H5794"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w*, which shall not \w regard|strong="H5375"\w* the \w person|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w old|strong="H2205"\w*, nor shew \w favour|strong="H2603"\w* to the \w young|strong="H5288"\w*:\f + \fr 28.50 \ft of fierce…: Heb. strong of face\f*

And he shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w cattle|strong="H0929"\w*, and the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thy \w land|strong="H0127"\w*, until thou be \w destroyed|strong="H8045"\w*: which \add also\add* shall not \w leave|strong="H7604"\w* thee \add either\add* \w corn|strong="H1715"\w*, \w wine|strong="H8492"\w*, or \w oil|strong="H3323"\w*, \add or\add* the \w increase|strong="H7698"\w* of thy \w kine|strong="H0504"\w*, or \w flocks|strong="H6251"\w* of thy \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w*, until he have \w destroyed|strong="H0006"\w* thee.

And he shall \w besiege|strong="H6887"\w* thee in all thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w*, until thy \w high|strong="H1364"\w* and \w fenced|strong="H1219"\w* \w walls|strong="H2346"\w* come \w down|strong="H3381"\w*, \w wherein|strong="H2004"\w* thou \w trustedst|strong="H0982"\w*, throughout all thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*: and he shall \w besiege|strong="H6887"\w* thee in all thy \w gates|strong="H8179"\w* throughout all thy \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee.

And thou shalt \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w fruit|strong="H6529"\w* of thine own \w body|strong="H0990"\w*, the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of thy \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* and of thy \w daughters|strong="H1323"\w*, which the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* thy \w God|strong="H0430"\w* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* thee, in the \w siege|strong="H4692"\w*, and in the \w straitness|strong="H4689"\w*, wherewith thine \w enemies|strong="H0341"\w* shall \w distress|strong="H6693"\w* thee:\f + \fr 28.53 \ft body: Heb. belly\f*

\add So that\add* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w* \add that is\add* \w tender|strong="H7390"\w* among you, and \w very|strong="H3966"\w* \w delicate|strong="H6028"\w*, his \w eye|strong="H5869"\w* shall be \w evil|strong="H3415"\w* toward his \w brother|strong="H0251"\w*, and toward the \w wife|strong="H0802"\w* of his \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*, and toward the \w remnant|strong="H3499"\w* of his \w children|strong="H1121"\w* which he shall \w leave|strong="H3498"\w*:

d* \w rejoiced|strong="H7797"\w* over you to do you \w good|strong="H3190"\w*, and to \w multiply|strong="H7235"\w* you; so the

d* will \w rejoice|strong="H7797"\w* over you to \w destroy|strong="H0006"\w* you, and to bring you to \w nought|strong="H8045"\w*; and ye shall be \w plucked|strong="H5255"\w* from off the \w land|strong="H0127"\w* whither thou \w goest|strong="H0935"\w* to \w possess|strong="H3423"\w* it.

And among \w these|strong="H1992"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* shalt thou find no \w ease|strong="H7280"\w*, neither shall the \w sole|strong="H3709"\w* of thy \w foot|strong="H7272"\w* have \w rest|strong="H4494"\w*: but the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* shall \w give|strong="H5414"\w* thee there a \w trembling|strong="H7268"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and \w failing|strong="H3631"\w* of \w eyes|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w sorrow|strong="H1671"\w* of \w mind|strong="H5315"\w*:
